Identification.ShortTitle: Office of the Registrar General Fees for Services Order
Identification.LongTitle: Order Prescribing the Fees To Be Paid by Persons for Services in Respect of the Issuance of Documents by the Office of the Registrar General of Canada

Provision.Text: The Minister of Consumer and Corporate Affairs, pursuant to paragraph 13(b) of the Financial Administration Act and Order in Council P.C. 1988-672 of April 14, 1988*, hereby makes the annexed Order prescribing the fees to be paid by persons for services in respect of the issuance of documents by the Office of the Registrar General of Canada, effective July 1, 1988.

Footnote.Text: SI/88-68, 1988 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 2352

SignatureTitle.Emphasis: Minister of Consumer and Corporate Affairs

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Office of the Registrar General Fees for Services Order.
The fees to be paid for the issuance of documents by the Office of the Registrar General of Canada are the following:

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: Certificate of Deposit pursuant to the Railway Act, the Canadian National Railway Act and the Bell Canada Act

Provision.Label: (c)
Provision.Text: Copies of documents deposited under the Railway Act, the Canadian National Railway Act and the Bell Canada Act, per page each 1

Provision.Label: (d)
Provision.Text: Copy of any other document each 10

Provision.Label: (e)
Provision.Text: Certified copy of any document each 35
